posts.post_content:
@ coyotemoon722:  
  
And just how are you getting this Darksteel Colossus or Inkwell Leviathan out with Arcum? He forces a player to sac target artifact CREATURE and lets them replace it with a NON-CREATURE artifact. So unless you can turn artifact creatures in your deck into non-creature artifacts your suggestion fails to work.

posts.post_content:
I use this guy as my EDH general. Things get insane quickly.   
  
T4: Play Arcum.  
T5: Sac an artifact creature to bring out [Myr Turbine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myr Turbine) for artifact creatures every turn.  
T6: [Darksteel Forge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Forge) (Or this out first if someone's playing red)  
  
etc. Or I can be cruel and just play [Myr Incubator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myr Incubator), [Darksteel Forge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Forge), and [Coat of Arms](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Coat of Arms).  
  
I find his flavor text very ironic.

Posted By: Nucleon (5/22/2011 10:25:05 AM)

posts.post_content: Nucleon, you don't know the half of it. I've put together an Arcum EDH deck that can literally play every card in the deck by turn 7 or quicker (turn 6 in the goldfish match, but against real opponents you probably want to spend a turn fetching up some protection for him, like a [Swiftfoot Boots](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Swiftfoot Boots)). The key combo is Arcum, [Thornbite Staff](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thornbite Staff), [Summoning Station](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Summoning Station), and [Mycosynth Lattice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycosynth Lattice) (all of which can be fetched up by Arcum, of course). Tap the Summoning Station to make a Pincher, and it's an artifact due to Mycosynth, so eligible for sacrifice. Tap Arcum and sacrifice the Pincher to fetch up whatever you want, and the Pincher dying triggers the abilities on the Summoning Station and the Staff, untapping both the Station and Arcum. Lather, rinse, repeat.
posts.html:
Nucleon, you don't know the half of it. I've put together an Arcum EDH deck that can literally play every card in the deck by turn 7 or quicker (turn 6 in the goldfish match, but against real opponents you probably want to spend a turn fetching up some protection for him, like a Swiftfoot Boots). The key combo is Arcum, Thornbite Staff, Summoning Station, and Mycosynth Lattice (all of which can be fetched up by Arcum, of course). Tap the Summoning Station to make a Pincher, and it's an artifact due to Mycosynth, so eligible for sacrifice. Tap Arcum and sacrifice the Pincher to fetch up whatever you want, and the Pincher dying triggers the abilities on the Summoning Station and the Staff, untapping both the Station and Arcum. Lather, rinse, repeat.

posts.post_content: Stuck him in a [Thopter Foundry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thopter Foundry) deck, and he works wonders. The Thopter Foundry+Sword of the Meek combo is easy enough to get out, but he can get the Sword should you be unable to find it, or search for a [Krark-Clan Ironworks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Krark-Clan Ironworks) for an infinite life/mana/thopters combo. With a Time Sieve on the field you get infinite turns too. Absolutely spectacular, it's like having a little bit of Tezzeret without having to build up for the tutor cost.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
This guy can be insane as an EDH general. Use mana accelerators like [Silver Myr](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silver Myr), [Manakin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Manakin) or [Myr Moonvessel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myr Moonvessel), then toss in an [Ornithopter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ornithopter), [Memnite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memnite) or [Myr Retriever](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Myr Retriever), and away you go.  
  
Drop in [Darksteel Forge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Forge), give Mr. Dagsson something like [Crab Umbra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crab Umbra) or [Freed from the Real](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Freed from the Real) and then it just gets stupid. Whether it's a [Darksteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Colossus) or [Blightsteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightsteel Colossus), or a [Time Vault](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Time Vault) and [Voltaic Key](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Voltaic Key), or even just [Mycosynth Lattice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycosynth Lattice) [Nevinyrral's Disk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nevinyrral's Disk).
posts.html:
This guy can be insane as an EDH general. Use mana accelerators like Silver Myr, Manakin or Myr Moonvessel, then toss in an Ornithopter, Memnite or Myr Retriever, and away you go.

Drop in Darksteel Forge, give Mr. Dagsson something like Crab Umbra or Freed from the Real and then it just gets stupid. Whether it's a Darksteel Colossus or Blightsteel Colossus, or a Time Vault and Voltaic Key, or even just Mycosynth Lattice Nevinyrral's Disk.
